review: The Fire TV stick was very easy to use right out of the box.  The paper instructional booklet diagrammed how to plug into our flat panel television and from there, the onscreen directions took over.  The easy steps allowed us to use the remote and connect to our wireless internet connection.  The screen selection for movies and television is easy to navigate and the choices are endless.  We have amazon prime which gives us the ultimate selection for hundreds and thousands of entertainment choices.We watched World War Z the first night, and loved having the ability to pause the movie to get snacks.  No issue.  I love this product and it has given us so many more choices right at our fingertips.  I am not sure why we waited so long.

review: Still a little buggy, I imagine many issues get resolved in the near future. Sometimes it attempts to start playing a video and then fails until I security wipe it. Seems like a common issue that needs to get cleared up soon. I feel that most people aren't going to know how to resolve the issue easily and, because of this, I feel the Fire TV Stick should incorporate more reliable automated clean-up tasks.Amazon's advice: http://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html?nodeId=201612210
